channel.title: Just a question
channel.description: i got my server n shit set up but nobodycan test it at the moment, is it true that i cant connect to my own ip (WAN offcourse, LAN and 127.0.0.1 do work) and, some website checked my open port and saw it (so it should work) but... is there a possibility that my client just times out when trying to connect to my WAN ip?? my client is a 508 client but i forgot which one
